title: Virtual Service-Learning Design and Operation in Catholic Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in primary education settings and basic proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening service-learning project design capabilities linked to language curricula, addressing digital transformation needs for in-service elementary school teachers

learning_goals: They can design a language curriculum-integrated service-learning project in a virtual environment.
They can plan educational activities reflecting Catholic Social Doctrine.
They can propose community-linked strategies utilizing digital tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
